title: Emerald Polki Jadau Necklace - 'Pachala' Elegance
materials: Polki Diamonds. Featuring traditional Hyderabadi Jadau setting for unmatched brilliance.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases the timeless beauty of natural emeralds and uncut Polki diamonds in a graduating design. The 'Jadau' setting, a hallmark of Hyderabadi craftsmanship, ensures each gemstone is securely and beautifully showcased. A central pendant adds further visual interest and movement.
colors: Vibrant emerald green complements the warm glow of yellow gold and the ethereal shimmer of Polki diamonds
creating a rich and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: and significant cultural celebrations like Seemantham (baby shower) and half-saree functions. Equally stunning for high-end social events where you want to make a lasting impression.
description: This necklace is more than just jewelry; it's an heirloom piece. The combination of natural emeralds, Polki diamonds, and traditional Jadau craftsmanship makes it a unique and highly valuable investment. The regal design exudes elegance and sophistication, perfect for the modern woman who appreciates traditional artistry.
